Fudgy Fig-Nut Brownies

3 large eggs

11/4 cups granulated sugar

1/4 cup canola oil

1 teaspoon vanilla extract

1 ounce unsweetened chocolate, chopped

1 cup all-purpose flour

2/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder

1/4 teaspoon salt

1 cup stemmed and chopped Blue Ribbon Orchard Selection or Sun-Maid Golden or Mission Figs

1/3 cup chopped, toasted walnuts

Preheat oven to 325�. Coat 8-inch square baking pan with nonstick spray. In www.wholesale-cheapsjewelry.com medium bowl, lightly beat eggs with wire whisk. Include sugar and whisk till well-blended. Whisk in oil and vanilla. Melt chocolate in small bowl in microwave oven on 50 % electrical power for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring every single moment. Whisk chocolate into egg mixture. In tiny bowl, stir collectively flour, cocoa and salt. Stir flour mixture into chocolate combination, blending till easy; batter will probably be stiff. Stir in figs and walnuts. Pass on batter in baking pan. Bake for 35 minutes or till choose inserted in center comes out having a few crumbs attached. Neat in pan on wire rack. Cut into 16 brownies.

Vitamins per serving (16): Calories 191; Protein 3g; Total Excess fat 7g; Carb 29g; Cholesterol 40mg; Dietary Fiber 2g; Sodium 65mg.

Figs, chocolate and walnuts--nutrition and taste Cheap Jewelry arrive together in 1 scrumptious brownie.
